title: Domestic details
author: Crossrig, David Hume
snippet: 2, Recept Laird of Wedderburn and M"" George Dickson of Buchtrig of one hundred and twenty pounds in satisfaction of all bygone few duties and in part of payment of the composition to be made for receiveing M' David Home his vassall Which Recept is dated twenty first of July I™ vj" seventy seven This and the thr following are now put in with the other papers cf the debts due by Crossrig Letter H. 3, Agreement betwixt Wedderburn M"" David Home and Crossrig subscribed be Wedderburn sixteenth November I™ vj° and seventy eight.
